name: LGBTQ+ Rights
socialShareText: Help these nonprofits inspire and engage all to end discrimination against LGBTQ+ Citizens and realize fundamental fairness and equality.
about: Help these nonprofits inspire and engage all to end discrimination against LGBTQ+ Citizens and realize fundamental fairness and equality.

nonprofits.name: Transgender Emergency Fund Of Massachusetts
nonprofits.about: Critical assistance for low-income and homeless transgender people living in Massachusetts.

nonprofits.name: The Trevor Project
nonprofits.about: The world's largest suicide prevention and crisis intervention organization for LGBTQ youth. TrevorLifeline: 866.488.7386.

nonprofits.name: Audre Lorde Project
nonprofits.about: Community organizing center for LGBTSTGNC People of Color.

nonprofits.name: Human Rights Campaign
nonprofits.about: We envision a world where LGBTQ people are ensured equality at home, at work and in every community.

nonprofits.name: National Black Justice Coalition
nonprofits.about: The National Black Justice Coalition is a civil rights organization dedicated to the empowerment of Black LGBTQ people.

nonprofits.name: Rainbow Railroad
nonprofits.about: We help LGBTQI people escape persecution and violence around the world. üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåàüåé You can help save lives.
